Package View.SpriteMangement

Klasse SpriteMetaDataGenerator

java.lang.Object
View.SpriteMangement.SpriteMetaDataGenerator
public class SpriteMetaDataGenerator extends Object
Can be used to access the Metadata to the sprites for a Fighting Entity.
